content.title: DVT Treatment Algorithm
content.definition: Evidence-based treatment algorithm for deep vein thrombosis including anticoagulation, thrombolysis, and mechanical thrombectomy.

concepts.definition: First-line treatment for most DVT, preventing clot propagation and recurrence.
Pharmacomechanical thrombolysis for iliofemoral DVT to prevent post-thrombotic syndrome.
Percutaneous mechanical clot removal as adjunct or alternative to thrombolysis.

clinical_features.advantage: Reduced lytic dose and bleeding risk

concepts.definition: Indication for inferior vena cava filter placement in DVT/PE.

clinical_features.retrievable_preferred: Should be removed when AC resumed

diagnostic_criteria.treatment_success: Resolution of symptoms, DVT non-occlusive or resolved on imaging
